trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a design host for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um host de design para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner class is the base class for data source designers, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataSourceDesigner é a classe base para designers de fonte de dados, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>classes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the DataSourceDesigner class.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um novo controle de fonte de dados, você também poderá criar um designer personalizado de controle para o controle e ele é derivado da classe DataSourceDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner class has two event methods: the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataSourceDesigner tem dois métodos de evento: o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dois eventos podem ser desabilitados temporariamente com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>método, que define o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event methods can be enabled again with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de evento podem ser habilitados novamente com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares two schemas.
trans-unit.target: Há dois métodos estáticos que você pode usar para avaliar a equivalência de esquemas ou modos de exibição sem criar uma instância da classe: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A>método compara dois esquemas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares the schemas of two views.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A>método compara os esquemas de dois modos de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner constructor is called by the design host at design time.
trans-unit.target: O construtor DataSourceDesigner é chamado pelo host de design em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de itens que são usados para criar um menu de lista de ação em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object containing the action list items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém os itens da lista de ação para o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Use the CanConfigure property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade CanConfigure em uma classe personalizada para habilitar ou desabilitar a configuração de tempo de design para uma fonte de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses the CanConfigure property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um host de design como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] usa a propriedade CanConfigure para determinar se um comando para configurar a fonte de dados aparece no menu da lista de ações em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Use the CanRefreshSchema property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade CanRefreshSchema em uma classe derivada para habilitar ou desabilitar a capacidade de atualizar o esquema em tempo de design para uma fonte de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the CanRefreshSchema property to return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo requer uma estrutura de dados constante e o esquema nunca será alterado, você deseja que a propriedade CanRefreshSchema para retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses the CanRefreshSchema property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um host de design como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] usa a propriedade CanRefreshSchema para determinar se um comando para atualizar o esquema aparece no menu da lista de ações em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you can see the CanRefreshSchema property in action by completing the following process: 1.
trans-unit.target: Em um design de host, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], você pode ver a propriedade CanRefreshSchema em ação Concluindo o processo a seguir: 1.

trans-unit.source: On your page, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Na página, coloque um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: No modo de Design, na lista de ações, clique em **configurar**.

trans-unit.source: Remove a few fields from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Remova alguns campos da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.
trans-unit.target: Na lista de ações, clique em **atualizar esquema**.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o utilitário de configuração de fonte de dados no host de design.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o método de configurar na <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>classe; no entanto, ele pode ser substituído pelos designers de fonte de dados personalizados herdando a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you can see the Configure method in action by completing the following process: 1.
trans-unit.target: Em um design de host, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], você pode ver o método de configuração na ação Concluindo o processo a seguir: 1.

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control on your page.
trans-unit.target: Colocar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle em sua página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: No modo de Design, na lista de ações, clicando em **configurar**.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando qualquer propriedade da fonte de dados associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup for displaying the associated data source control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a marcação HTML para exibir o controle de fonte de dados associados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the GetDesignTimeHtml method returns the result from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão do método GetDesignTimeHtml retorna o resultado da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The markup for the design-time display.
trans-unit.target: A marcação para a exibição de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object that is identified by the view name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que é identificado pelo nome da exibição.

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, if `viewName` does not exist, the GetView method should return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Em classes derivadas, se `viewName` não existir, o método deve retornar de GetView `null`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view.
trans-unit.target: O nome da exibição.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the view names that are available in this data source.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz dos nomes de exibição que estão disponíveis nessa fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: An array of view names.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de nomes de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> eventos quando as propriedades da fonte de dados tem sido alterado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataSourceChanged notifica os designers de controle de cada controle que está associado à fonte de dados associado ao atualizar seu controle no host de design.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataSourceChanged pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>método ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>método com um argumento de `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object provided by the calling object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto fornecido pelo objeto de chamada.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"> </xref> evento quando o esquema da fonte de dados foi alterado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: The OnSchemaRefreshed method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método OnSchemaRefreshed notifica os designers de controle de cada controle que está associado à fonte de dados associados os campos no esquema foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The OnSchemaRefreshed method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> property with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método OnSchemaRefreshed pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>método ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>propriedade com um argumento de `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema da fonte de dados, enquanto suprime opcionalmente eventos.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o método RefreshSchema na <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: However, it is supported in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, há suporte em classes derivadas, como a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow events when refreshing the schema; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> events when refreshing the schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para permitir eventos ao atualizar o esquema; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para desabilitar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"> </xref> eventos ao atualizar o esquema.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Restores data source events after the data source events have been suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Restaura os eventos de fonte de dados depois que os eventos de fonte de dados foram suprimidos.

trans-unit.source: Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false` or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de fonte de dados podem ser suprimidos definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>propriedade `false` ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>método com um argumento de `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que o esquema foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that indicates whether two schemas are equal.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um valor que indica se dois esquemas são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the two schemas is based on the views, as well as the names and types of the fields that are contained in the views.
trans-unit.target: Comparação de dois esquemas baseia-se em modos de exibição, bem como os nomes e tipos dos campos que estão contidos nos modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The SchemasEquivalent method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O método SchemasEquivalent pode ser usado sem uma instância da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The first schema to compare (derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: O primeiro esquema para comparar (derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: The second schema to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo esquema a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both schemas are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ambos os esquemas são equivalentes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Postpones all data source events until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Adia todos os eventos de fonte dados até após o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> evento ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>método ocorre.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The SuppressingDataSourceEvents property can be set by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SuppressingDataSourceEvents pode ser definida ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>método com um argumento de `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if events are being suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os eventos estão sendo suprimidos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that determines whether two schema views are equal.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um valor que determina se os dois modos de exibição de esquema são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The ViewSchemasEquivalent method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O método ViewSchemasEquivalent pode ser usado sem uma instância da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The first view to compare (derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: A primeira exibição para comparar (derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: The second view to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo modo de exibição a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both views are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ambos os modos de exibição forem equivalentes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
